lead_paragraph: The headline on the baseball roundup in some copies on Thursday misspelled the surname of the Oakland Athletics pitcher who won Wednesday’s game against the Boston Red Sox in Tokyo. He is Rich Harden, not Hardin.
snippet: The headline on the baseball roundup in some copies on Thursday misspelled the surname of the Oakland Athletics pitcher who won Wednesday’s game against the Boston Red Sox in Tokyo. He is Rich Harden, not Hardin.
